scripts.start: concurrently "npm run cramer" "npm run bisec" "npm run falseposi" "npm run onepoint" "npm run newtonRap" "npm run secant" "npm run trapezoidal" "npm run client"
scripts.cramer: cd server && cross-env PORT=5000 nodemon server.js
scripts.bisec: cd server && cross-env PORT=5010 nodemon bisec.js
scripts.falseposi: cd server && cross-env PORT=5020 nodemon falsepo.js
scripts.onepoint: cd server && cross-env PORT=5030 nodemon onepoint.js
scripts.newtonRap: cd server && cross-env PORT=5040 nodemon newtonRap.js
scripts.secant: cd server && cross-env PORT=5050 nodemon secant.js
scripts.client: cd client && cross-env PORT=3000 npm start
scripts.trapezoidal: cd server && cross-env PORT=5300 nodemon trapezoidal.js
